solution_line_template: If there are {santa_monica_surfers} surfers at Santa Monica, Malibu beach has twice as many surfers as Santa Monica has {malibu_multiplier}*{santa_monica_surfers} = {malibu_surfers} surfers.
Together, the two beaches have a total of {malibu_surfers}+{santa_monica_surfers} = <<{malibu_surfers}+{santa_monica_surfers}={total_surfers}>>{total_surfers} surfers.
